items.title: Watch These Microsoft Levels as Stock Hits Another Record High
items.description: Microsoft shares extended their winning streak to eight consecutive days on Monday amid investor optimism about the tech giant's prospects during the AI boom. Monitor these crucial chart levels.

items.title: Amazon wants to become a global marketplace for AI
items.description: As the global AI race heats up, Amazon Web Services doubles down on its bet that every model should get a seat at the table.

items.title: Which Software Stocks Is BofA Securities Bullish On?
items.description: The BofA Securities software research team hosted 18 public and 10 private companies at the BofA Global Technology Conference in San Francisco on June 3-5. With an ever-changing macro policy backdrop, the spending environment was the focus of this discussion. AI product cycles were another key topic discussed, with companies citing healthy pilot activity for agentic applications. items.description: Explore Nvidia Corporation's growth potential and valuation using PEG ratio analysis. Click for my updated look at NVDA stock as I compare it to Microsoft (MSFT).
